title: Failed to Encode struct to JSON after removing node from inherit array
body:
Sources : https://github.com/Heather/Mirana/blob/master/src/Config.rs#L30

steps to reproduce :
- serialize to json array of sctruct which have inherit array of sctruct
- remove nodes from inherit array of struct
- save

check this gist with diff: https://gist.github.com/Heather/7264371

it saves correct json and adds some trash (which is removed inherit struct) to the and fo json breaking it's format

log:

``` shell
D:\TFS>cat shades.conf
[
  {
    "pretty": true,
    "shade": "default",
    "repositories": [
      {
        "loc": "git@github.com:Heather/rust.git",
        "t": "git",
        "upstream": "git@github.com:mozilla/rust.git",
        "m": "master",
        "branches": [
          "master"
        ]
      }
    ]
  }
]
D:\TFS>mirana.exe -l
_________________________________________________________________________
   Mirana v0.0.6 , Windows
_________________________________________________________________________
>-- repo: git@github.com:Heather/rust.git
 *  type: git
 *  upstream: git@github.com:mozilla/rust.git master
 *  branches: master
_________________________________________________________________________

D:\TFS>mirana.exe -d rust
_________________________________________________________________________
   Mirana v0.0.6 , Windows
_________________________________________________________________________
~"git@github.com:Heather/rust.git" removed

D:\TFS>mirana.exe -l
_________________________________________________________________________
   Mirana v0.0.6 , Windows
_________________________________________________________________________
task '<unnamed>' failed at 'Repo list is broken', D:\Heather\Contrib\P\rust\src\libstd\


D:\TFS>cat shades.conf
[
  {
    "pretty": true,
    "shade": "default",
    "repositories": []
  }
]{
        "loc": "git@github.com:Heather/rust.git",
        "t": "git",
        "upstream": "git@github.com:mozilla/rust.git",
        "m": "master",
        "branches": [
          "master"
        ]
      }
    ]
  }
]
```

same without pretty

``` shell
D:\TFS>cat shades.conf
[{"pretty":false,"shade":"default","repositories":[{"loc":"git@github.com:Heather/rust.git","t":"git
","upstream":"git@github.com:mozilla/rust.git","m":"master","branches":["master"]}]}]
D:\TFS>mirana.exe -l
_________________________________________________________________________
   Mirana v0.0.6 , Windows
_________________________________________________________________________
>-- repo: git@github.com:Heather/rust.git
 *  type: git
 *  upstream: git@github.com:mozilla/rust.git master
 *  branches: master
_________________________________________________________________________

D:\TFS>mirana.exe -d rust
_________________________________________________________________________
   Mirana v0.0.6 , Windows
_________________________________________________________________________
~"git@github.com:Heather/rust.git" removed

D:\TFS>mirana.exe -l
_________________________________________________________________________
   Mirana v0.0.6 , Windows
_________________________________________________________________________
task '<unnamed>' failed at 'Repo list is broken', D:\Heather\Contrib\P\rust\src\libstd\result.rs:129


D:\TFS>cat shades.conf
[{"pretty":false,"shade":"default","repositories":[]}]oc":"git@github.com:Heather/rust.git","t":"git
","upstream":"git@github.com:mozilla/rust.git","m":"master","branches":["master"]}]}]
```

it looks like it came with recent rust changes but not sure
